title: Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Standard Package
description: The Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Standard Package is a feature-rich instrument suitable for musicians of all levels. With 61 full-size touch-sensitive keys and the new AiX Sound Source, it delivers stunningly realistic sounds and powerful accompaniment styles. The keyboard includes 600 built-in tones, 195 rhythms, and an array of effects to enhance your performance. The intuitive interface and educational features, such as the Step-Up Lesson system, make learning easy and enjoyable. The standard package includes the keyboard, power adapter, music rest, and user manual. Perfect for practice and performance, the CT-X700 offers a versatile and powerful playing experience.
meta_title: Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Standard Package
meta_description: Shop the Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Standard Package, featuring 61 touch-sensitive keys, AiX Sound Source, 600 built-in tones, and Step-Up Lesson system. Ideal for musicians of all levels. Buy now at a special price!

title: Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Premium Package
description: The Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Premium Package provides everything you need for a superior playing experience. This package includes the advanced CT-X700 keyboard with 61 full-size touch-sensitive keys and the new AiX Sound Source, offering realistic sounds and powerful accompaniment styles. The keyboard features 600 built-in tones, 195 rhythms, and various effects to enhance your music. The premium package also includes a sturdy keyboard stand, a padded bench, a sustain pedal, headphones, and a power adapter. With its user-friendly interface and educational features like the Step-Up Lesson system, the CT-X700 is perfect for both learning and performance. Experience the full potential of your music with this comprehensive package.
meta_title: Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Premium Package
meta_description: Discover the Casio CT-X700 Portable Keyboard - Premium Package, featuring 61 touch-sensitive keys, AiX Sound Source, 600 built-in tones, and premium accessories. Ideal for musicians of all levels. Buy now at a special price!
